response.original_title: Harry And His Bucket Full Of Dinosaurs: Once Upon A Time
response.overview: Harry goes to Dino World in search of a green crayon and meets a naughty troll who will not let him cross the stream without a magic password. After many unsuccessful guesses, Harry learns that a simple 'please' goes a long way.  Featuring 6 super episodes 1. Once Upon a Time  2. Mirror Mirror 3. Two Plus Two Makes Four 4. Aaarrggh Treasure 5. I've Got the Giggles 6. My Tooth Has Come Out
response.title: Harry And His Bucket Full Of Dinosaurs: Once Upon A Time
